context.introduction: Master the tools and rice preparation techniques of Korean cooking. Learn about rice varieties, stone bowls, and the importance of washing rice.

sections.title: Rice Varieties
sections.content: Short-grain rice is preferred in Korean cuisine for its sticky texture, perfect for eating with chopsticks.

sections.title: Stone Bowls
sections.content: Stone bowls (dolsot) are used to cook and serve rice, creating a crispy layer at the bottom.

sections.title: Rice Washing
sections.content: Washing rice several times removes excess starch and ensures a clean, fluffy result.

sections.title: Preparation Tips
listItems: Wash rice until water runs clear
Use the right rice for each dish
Let rice rest after cooking for best texture
